location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Frederick Greenwood, Pall MallGazette, Northumberland Street, Strand, London to Colonel Lewis Pelly, Agent to the Governor-General for Rajpootana [Rājasthān]

mods.abstract: Letter informing Pelly that he was not aware of there having been any attacks on Lord Lytton (Edward Bulwer-Lytton, 2nd Barond Lytton) and that there appears in general to be a more favourable feeling entertained towards him.
